name: Gentle Moonlight
description: Perfume with the smell of sea, Mixed with citrus and wood fragrance. After use, the body will be covered with moonlight, Just like the blue velvet water under moonlight, Graceful but a little sad.

name: Gentleman's Staff [1]
description: A magic wand favored by a Mage in some country. It is said that the thin swords are hidden in some wands.

name: Gentleman's Staff [2]
description: The magic staff of an unknown Mage. Legend has it that slender swords are hidden in some staffs.

name: Ghost Bandana
description: Triangle hat prepared for the dead in certain small East country.

name: Ghost Bandana Blueprint
description: Triangle hat prepared for the dead in certain small East country.

name: Ghost Bandana [1]
description: Triangle hat prepared for the dead in certain small East country.

name: Ghost Honey
description: Spirit's favorite honey wine. After drinking, You can summon an Archer Spirit to help attack. The spirit will exist 5 minutes, For every 3 attacks you launch, the spirit will deal 200 points of True Dmg to the target. Spirit will not disappeared after your death. This item can only be used on PVP maps.

name: Ghost Mask
description: Wearing a mystery mask, you can to anywhere, even dangerous places.

name: Ghost Picnic Pad
description: A picnic pad with the style and design of ghost. It's as light as a whisper. Does it really exist?

name: Ghost Ship Material Pack
description: Ghost Ship Material Pack, in which all kinds of Ghost Ship materials can be found.

name: Giant Axe [1]
description: The giant Two-Handed Axe that seems to be impossible to move.
effect: Damage to S-size monsters ＋10%,Dmg to Dark monsters ＋30%

name: Giant Axe [2]
description: The giant Two-Handed Axe that seems to be impossible to move.
effect: Damage to S-size monsters ＋10%,Dmg to Dark monsters ＋30%

name: Giant Battle Axe
description: A weapon favored by people who are confident in their strength.

name: Giant Battle Axe [2]
description: A weapon favored by people who are confident in their strength.

name: Giant Bow [2]
description: Its name is Giant Bow. Since it is big and heavy, it will be difficult to handle. But its powerful attack is impressive.
